issue.title: [CF 547] TellMeWhen_Options out of date after upgrade
issue.body:
Just downloaded TMW for the first time after patch 5.0.4 hit (version 6.0.1). When I attempt to open the addon (with /tmw or /tellmewhen) I get the following messages in my chatbox:

TellMeWhen: Loading TellMeWhen_Options
TellMeWhen: TellMeWhen_Options could not be loaded: Out of date

The TellMeWhen tab in my Interface>Addons menu is also completely blank. It exists, but there's nothing in it.

Of course the obvious answer would be that it isn't updated for 5.0.4 but I'm seeing that other people have it working fine. Will attach my TellMeWhen.lua in case it helps

Thanks, and sorry if it's something stupid :P


> Posted by CurseForge user JasonK33 | Imported from CurseForge issue #547 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua
